website_summaries.verdict: Whether she’s munching Halloween candy or playing in the garden, this delightful collection of coloring pages showcasing some of Pusheen’s favorite activities will win over her gigantic fan base.
pros: 94 adorable pages starring Pusheen the tabby cat
Sports a range of simple and more complex pages for a wider age range
Large variety, including seasonal and holiday themes
cons: Illustrations are printed on both sides of each page

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Coloring for relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Pusheen pictures. I wish the pages were perforated so they were easier to remove from the book. Also, it would be nice if the paper was thicker or if images were not double sided. We will probably only be able to color 50% of the pictures due to marker bleeding. However, gel pens also work well and do not bleed through. See my images for an example- I colored autumn Pusheen but summer Pusheen was sadly ruined.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY ADORABLE- terrible for markers
customer_reviews.text: I actually specifically bought coloring book things because of this book. It's so utterly adorable and I was just wowing at myself in joy at all of the cute pictures. However, I'm one of those people that like to color with markers vs colored pencils/crayons. When I started seeing the pages being double sided I grew incredibly worried. And to my fears- the pages bled the color. This means if I continue to use my markers, I have to choose one side of the page over the other since I'll destroy the other one with color bleed. This upset me so greatly that I almost dont want to color in it :<
customer_reviews.author: C. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone who love Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! I preordered this coloring book and it arrived the morning of the release. While I ordered it for my Pusheen loving kids, I may need to get a second for myself. There are a variety of larger simpler designs and smaller more intricate designs. Great for all ages of Pusheen lovers. Only bummer is that the pages are not perforated so they are not easily torn out. Which is what I usually do for my kids to make them easier to color flat and they always want to display their masterpieces.
customer_reviews.author: CherryExtract

customer_reviews.title: Cute Coloring for Any Age
customer_reviews.text: The book is really cute. Some pages are big, plain, but cute (just like Pusheen) but some are also a tad more detailed - not necessarily an 'adult' coloring book detailed as this book can be enjoyed at any age. People have been reporting bleeding with markers - I use crayons and colored pencils with this book and haven't had problems yet. Would highly recommend for any cat or Pusheen lover, people who like to color casually, and anyone who likes cute things (Pusheen poses frequently with sweets, hearts, flowers, and mystical creatures).
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. There are a nice combination of busy images and very simple ones. Large spaces so it's easy to stay in the lines and great quality paper. The only reason I reserve a star is the pages aren't perforated so you can't easily get them out of the book and designs run into the seam so you can't easily finish filling them in. Other than that I love it. Ordered one for my daughter. Will likely get one for my sister as well.
customer_reviews.author: Octoberly

customer_reviews.title: Great but some markers bleed through
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is adorable. It arrived on time and it was in great condition. It has 94 colorable pages and there are designs on both sides of each page. It's nice that some of the designs are very simple and can be colored in just a few minutes while some are more complex/inticrate and will take longer. Since there are designs on both sides of the page some markers will bleed through. I have found that the double-ended markers from Target and the double ended Super Markers brand I have do not bleed through. But BiC Mark-it markers do bleed through very noticeably (I have included pictures.)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love all things pusheen and I love to color! This book is super cute! Only downside is the pages are double sided. I don't care though because it's so cute! Had to buy a second book because that's how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: kri412Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love to color and have been following Pusheen for awhile now. When I saw they made a coloring book for her I just had to get it. The pages are fun and cute. I enjoy this as well because the drawings are not super detailed yet provide hours and hours. This book will take quite some time to color depending on your choice of ink or pencils. Recommended for both kid and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Dillan Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Best coloring book we've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and worth it. The paper is nice quality and each page is so adorable. There are so many different choices to color. Should keep my daughter busy and happy for a long time. She loves art and this will help her with her drawing since theres such cute ideas in here. No lie, as an adult I kinda want to buy the mini version for myself. It's so cute, Pusheen fans will love this coloring book!
customer_reviews.author: Katy F

customer_reviews.title: The quality is pretty good. Only con I can think of is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with this coloring book! There are a variety of pictures that are the cutest. The quality is pretty good. Only con I can think of is that the pages are double-sided and not perforated. Other than that, I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: So cute and tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and fun to color book. I love Pusheen and just had to have this. I'm so glad I got it. The pages are all adorable. The pages are simple enough that kids can color them just fine, but fun enough that adults can enjoy it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Errin Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Overall!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality coloring book for adults and children alike. Big and small spaces to color, heavy-duty paper quality and solid binding. DISCLAIMER: AMAZON and SIMON&SCHUSTER are NOT to be held RESPONSIBLE for ANY incidents of CUTENESS OVERLOAD while enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.author: CJS.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but please don't use markers
customer_reviews.text: I love pusheen so much, this coloring book is so adorable, one piece of advise DO NOT USE MARKERS this coloring book is adorable and I love the more intricate designs, but using markers in a coloring book is never a good idea, just use colored pencils, or crayons. (I like the crayola 96 pack of crayons and the crayola 50 set adult coloring pencils also crayola) But overall this is a great coloring book for pusheen lovers.
customer_reviews.author: brklynma

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Goodness, Bought this for a friend, Will buy one for me. Sooooo cute. Every picture is adorable, and well printed. The pages were good quality, the binding was well-done, and The humor was cute, and completely clean. Some coloring books are 'but' coloring books. You love them but...(insert reason here). This is not one of those books. I cannot stress enough just how CUTE this little kitty is!
customer_reviews.author: Allie MillerTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute drawings, but PRINT was poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Big Pusheen fans here. Love the drawings in this book, they are very cute. The pages are big and square, which we like. That said, the printing was poorly made. The pages are printed on both sides. So far, I have used colored pencils. But when colored in the coloring shows on the opposite side of the page. Not only is that not good, but when pressing the pencil on one side, which happens to pass over the pre print of the opposite side, it actually transfers the black outline to its facing page, which is a big NO NO!
customer_reviews.author: GamieTiaBettita

customer_reviews.title: A D O R A B L E
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly one of the cutest things I've ever purchased. Not only is it ADORABLE, it's of very high quality. The patterns in the book to color are super cute, and I wish that they were available as individual prints or wallpapers. The cover of the book is embossed, which just lends itself to an even higher feeling of quality. My ONLY problem with the book ... Is that the pages aren't tear out. I would much prefer it the pages were easy to tear out so that I could post them around or hang them or do something cute with them.
customer_reviews.author: LittleGreenMachine

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I love this coloring book so much! it has a great balance of more complex (but not too complex) pages and ones where you can just take your utensil and color about a quarter of the page for a single shape. The paper is relatively thick and won't tear easily and is smooth so that the color can be dispersed evenly. The ink doesn't affect the color of the crayons i use either. I think it would be suitable for crayons, pencils, markers, and pens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COLORING BOOK! If you are a Pusheen fan this is a definate must have for your repertoire. Alcohol markers will bleed thru. Pages have art on front and back but nothing that a good set of Tombow markers (Amazon, has them cheaper) cant fix. The artwork is spacious and simple for those days when i dont feel like tackling alot of intricate details. Plus Pusheen just lifts my spirit with his sassy spirit. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine stemm

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Bookcover was heavily scratched and damaged when I received it. Also wasn’t too impressed with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: W. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Pencils work best
customer_reviews.text: The paper is thin, which prevents me from using pens and markers, but I am okay with that. I love colouring this, it has a good variety of sizes so you don't have to spend too much time in any one tiny section. I highly recommend for myone who likes cats, colouring, or Pusheen. Would be a wonderful gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful coloring book 💜
customer_reviews.text: I love the patterns!!! More importantly as you can see from the attached photos is that the markers actually did not bleed through like some others said. The first picture is the front and the dinosaur side is the back of that colorful page. These are not pictures that should be ripped out and it is hard to color in the seam of the coloring book but that’s as expected. Most pages are not too complicated and I think that makes it very easy to relax while coloring. I recommend especially for my fellow college students!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Fun coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: So darn cute - who can resist Pusheen? I think I'll hide this one from the kids! Paper is good quality, not newsprint, and the pictures have just enough detail to keep it interesting (as coloring goes) without being overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: KelleySquared

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Book!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is too cute for words! I absolutely adore Pusheen. The paper is of medium quality. The images are printed on both sides of the paper but that doesn't bother me. I have tested watercolors, Neocolor IIs, and Kuretake Zig Real Brush watercolor pens. None of them bled to the other side of the paper. Bold, crisp black line art. Variety of cute, adorable images of Pusheen. Definitely a must have for the lovers of all things Kawaii!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun coloring book to de-stess!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute coloring book! I love Pusheen and the art is actually managable to color in (nothing super crazy like other adult coloring books but not as simple as a kids coloring book). Perfect medium, I would recommend any Pusheen lover to check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen coloring book
customer_reviews.text: So I'll admit that I have never heard of Pusheen the cat before so when my daughter's friend gave her the idea for her birthday present I had to come to Amazon to see what it was. Amazon had a large supply of this character and the coloring book is very cute and a great birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wyler

customer_reviews.title: CUTEST. COLORING. BOOK. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I knew this coloring book was going to be cute, but man is it bursting with adorable things to color! I've only colored the first page so far, but I've skimmed through the rest of the book and I can see I have loads of fun coming up ahead! Great thick quality pages. Worth the money. Great gift for cat lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plenty of pages to color!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this book it's the quality and every single page is so beautiful! I love pusheen so does my daughter so we are both happy! Plenty of pages to color and all the details are just so pretty! I'm happy with my purchase Nd I high recommend this book to anyone specially if you love pusheen!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy mom

customer_reviews.title: The patterns are super cute and kids can color them as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying it for the 3rd time. The patterns are super cute and kids can color them as well as adults. The paper is thick and sturdy. But it's hard to tear the sheets off to display because there are no perforated lines like some other coloring books have.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Cute Coloring
customer_reviews.text: You would expect a coloring book with Pusheen to be as sweet and charming as the character. This book is exactly that. There are complex mandalas of kitty images and some very simple larger pictures. Just the thing for relaxing coloring.
customer_reviews.author: sandra carter

customer_reviews.title: Fun large images
customer_reviews.text: Love that the pictures have large objects without a lot of tedious things to color. Very fun cute pictures! I have 4 other adult coloring books but this will surely be a favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Baltonative

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Once again a hit with the tween crowd. Arrived as expected and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie R.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love the drawing in this book! It is exactly what I was looking for I like coloring pages with repeating patterns and very simple lines, that is exactly what this book contains. This is the perfect gift for any cat lover in your life. My only complaint is that the pictures are printed on each side of the pages and they are not perforated for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: RedOwl

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very cute with lots of pages! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very cute with lots of pages! I was surprised by how thick it is. However, the grain of the paper makes colored pencils look almost streaky, so I'd suggest markers. Ink doesn't seem to bleed through the page too much. Also, I'd suggest laying a page or two of scratch paper between pages because pressing too hard while coloring causes the designs to transfer over to the page below.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great book!
customer_reviews.text: this coloring book is so adorable! I bought it because a friend told me it was cute and have since bought it for another friend lol. the book is of great material the pages are nice and thick. great book for anyone who likes to color
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake911

customer_reviews.title: Cute .. but printed on both sides!
customer_reviews.text: This Pusheen coloring book is so cute! However, the pages are printed back to back and it messes up the coloring as you can see from other side.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: I love this coloring book the only bad thing is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this coloring book the only bad thing is the printing is so dark the actually prints bleeds 1-2 pages behind the picture you are coloring. I use color pencil but I am sure makers would bleed throught as well. I put a couple of blank sheets of paper between the the first couple pages to help with the print bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Dramanerd

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect for the Pusheen Lover!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great and well made coloring book. Definitely get your moneys worth. I enjoy using glitter gel pens to color my pages. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Creepy

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Pusheen?
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves Pusheen and is really enjoying this coloring book. It's a good size but the major downside is that the pages are double sided. So if you're using dark markers, it bleeds through to the other side a little and ruins that picture. But it's a cute book overall.
customer_reviews.author: celticmommie

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite coloring books =)
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is super cute! It has so many different adorable themes, and a huge variety in skill level from page to page. As an adult, I love it, but kids would love it too. Very glad I pre-ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: very cute!
customer_reviews.text: had no problems with this, just that i didnt like the dinosaur ones. But overall its a very cute book with many pages that are adorable :) I love it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Cool Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: The illustrations in this book are adorable. I bought this because the other adult coloring books out there are too intricate and pretty overwhelming to do for folks who stress easily like me. I want to relax when I color! This one has more simple pictures and easy to follow spaces. I actually bought two because I thought the pictures were too cute to ruin by my poor color choices. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. Love the illustrations. The paper quality is good and works well with colored pencils
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Adorable 💕
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this coloring book is just adorable, sweet and darling. There’s plenty of pages to color, but some of them seem slightly repetitive. Still, I don’t regret this purchase at all. Anyone who loves pusheen needs this!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: We love Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book has coloring pages that are from the Pusheen books. There are also some Pusheen pattern pages to color. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: SMor

customer_reviews.title: favorite thing to color!
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best grown up coloring books ever. the paper quality is amazing & the pages are so fun & a great way to kill time! <3 totally recommend for any cat lover and/or Pusheen fan
customer_reviews.author: nerdgirl_in_ny

customer_reviews.title: Really big, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, suger big (maybe i should have checked the size description haha), and its pusheen so its super cute! A lot of variety between detailed pages and pages with big spaces. Good for any age, i'd think.
customer_reviews.author: bubbles

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE TOY of my daughter's birthday
customer_reviews.text: FAVORITE TOY of my daughter's birthday. Fabulous pictures which are all Different, by the way, on every page. So many ways to be creative with Pusheen and his friends. She then discovered the Pusheen website and she is in total delight!! This book is whimsical, imaginative and engaging. My daughter is 11 and captivated by it.
customer_reviews.author: Unikitty

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old who is in love with Pusheen and she loves this coloring book! She stares at this coloring book non stop! I probably could've just bought this one and only gift for her Christmas present and she would've been a happy camper! If your child likes Pusheen, you have to purchase this coloring book!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter received this for Christmas and she loved it! She is 7 years old so I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas and she loved it! She is 7 years old so I really liked that it was all easy to color designs with thick outlining. She enjoyed all the fun designs and the pages were thick enough to work with all her crayons, pencil, and markers with no issue. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun, doesn't bleed through with marker
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cheap, and very diverse coloring book with all sorts of styles and designs. Paper is thick and tough: I use marker and it doesn't bleed through. The designs are adorable, featuring many Pusheens such as the unicorn and dinosaur variants. Some pages include text. Easy and fun coloring for all ages. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lily Foote

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Pusheen fans!
customer_reviews.text: Huge Pusheen fan, I've gotten into the coloring book hype lately. I was super stoked to see they we're coming out with a Pusheen coloring book, I reordered it! It came earlier than expected, and I was very satisfied with the layout of the pages. For all the Pusheen fans out there, you know she has her many disguises, her taste in food, and her obsession of laziness. I recommend this book for everyone who wants to make Pusheen unique in their own special way. Thank you Clare Belton and Andrew Duff for putting this cat in our lives. xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super duper cute! The pages are great. Not overly detailed like the "adult" coloring books. Perfect for the pusheen fans.
customer_reviews.author: S. Varney

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coloring book! Super cute, and the pages are thick which is nice so it doesn’t show through the other side of the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chung

customer_reviews.title: Fun coloring book for kids or adults who want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun coloring book for kids or adults who want to zone out. I use markers and they do not bleed through which is nice because there is images to color on either side of the page. Sharpie would probably run through the pages. Crayola markers do not. Colored pencils run smoothly across pages. Adorable pudgy kitty to color? What's better!?
customer_reviews.author: NicoleC

customer_reviews.title: Big coloring book
customer_reviews.text: A great big coloring book of pusheen. My daughter will love it . she adores pusheen. Defintly worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Danette garcia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pictures
customer_reviews.text: Oh my oldest daughter loves this coloring book. Has such cute and detailed pictures in it. I needed up buying another one for my youngest daughter. Love it..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Urban

customer_reviews.title: Cutee.
customer_reviews.text: We love Pusheen. Great coloring book and we love how chunky the line are for kids coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Natisadid

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen is adorable for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable coloring book that is suitable for any age! I am 42 and just love the cute images! They are so fun to color! It's nice to take a break from the intricate adult coloring books and just have fun with this! You can still easily add your own flair even though they may be simple pics. I'd highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: grahamcrackerz5

customer_reviews.title: Thick lines, tons of room for creativity! Ton of pages.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Pages are thin but colored pencils and crayons are suitable for this book. Tons of pages, you will be busy with this book for a while. I may not be done with my shading on the page but so far so good. 10/10 for me and pusheen lovers alike will probably adore this coloring book. Stress relief indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Beware marker users
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Pages are double printed and pretty thin so if you use marker they bleed through. But if you use anything else this great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wish there were more
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this book. The pictures are super cute and fun, the paper is thick and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Young

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book
customer_reviews.text: The best coloring book and its quality is great. I will buy one for my self soon.
customer_reviews.author: patricia bermudez

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coloring book. I work a high stress customer service job and this helps so much to color and have fun in between calls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So adorable. I got this for my little sister's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: So adorable. I got this for my little sister's birthday and it has the cutest pictures some easy some more difficult and all very clear and cute as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Cute coloring book for Pusheen lovers!
customer_reviews.text: A more advanced coloring book similar to the adult kind. Great for older children.
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: If you love coloring and you love pusheen, this is the book for you! Lots of really adorable designs to color. I got one for my best friend for her birthday and she got me the same one for mine, because we both are pusheen fans.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly303

customer_reviews.title: Cute Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave this book 5 stars. She loves the pictures, and is enjoying coloring it.
customer_reviews.author: Makin time for Fitness

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Cute pics and nice quality paper - kept my 9 year old niece entertained together with a nice box of colored pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very cute book. Half of the pictures are not what I would consider 'adult'. It was good for my daughter (5 yo) to color at the same time. The biggest problem is the quality of the ink the pictures are printed with. They transfer from page to page and smear if colored over.
customer_reviews.author: Diam0ndD0g

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen coloring
customer_reviews.text: If you like Pusheen and want to free your mind and just doodle a bit with colors, this is the right coloring book for you.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Runia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coloring Book!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this coloring book. I'm obsessed with Pusheen so my boyfriend ordered this book for me. I like how the images are large...Not too fine or detailed. It's different from other adult coloring books that have very fine and detailed images. The pictures are fun!
customer_reviews.author: ssgonzal

customer_reviews.title: Cute coloring book
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 of these coloring books and it so cute too, 2 for the kids a part of a gift and 1 for myself, yeah for MYSELF :), but a bit messy while in coloring.....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I Love Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Push even makes me happy...I am 47 and purchased this book for myself. I have colored so much and so hard that the pages are falling out. (Not due to poor quality, due to my enjoyment.) I even pre-ordered the new Pusheen miniature coloring book. It is coming out the day before my birthday. How awesome is that....
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable!! My 8th graders love the pages and I do too! I’m obsessed with Pusheen!! Well made book.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Spadafino

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: About 9"x10", 50 pages? both sides, every page different. My 9 year old daughter said the adult coloring books we had were too hard to color, too detailed, and she wanted to use shading and more of her imagination. She loves this and the I ♥ CUTE coloring book too.
customer_reviews.author: L&N's Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Meow 😻
customer_reviews.text: Puuuur-fect ;) book with plenty of coloring pages and a variety of cute designs. Worth the money too. (I got the much cheaper paperback, idk about the hardcover). Great for all pusheen cat fans! 😸
customer_reviews.author: thesnowqueen17

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute colorbook, not super fine detailed.
customer_reviews.author: J Bronsink

customer_reviews.title: The paper is double sided!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item, because it is full of cute pictures. The one thing I hated is that when you use marker, the marker leaks on the back side of the paper and the pages are double sided.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS A. FILIPIAK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is so cute! I have seen a few reviews stating that it is cheaply made but I have to disagree. For only $10, it's an amazing deal. I bought this with the Pusheen accessory case for my sister's birthday present. I am so excited to give it to her!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Nice color book
customer_reviews.text: Great Pusheen color book. Very well made and cute designs for crayons, pens or pencils.
customer_reviews.author: CNH

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars for cuteness. 3 stars for function. I wish the pages were perforated and one sided. Other than that. It's an adorable coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: mmayhugh

customer_reviews.title: Great book! This is my second one buying one ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book! This is my second one buying one and they are great! So many cute pictures and pusheen never fails being cute! There is no way to tear the pages out unless you cut them with scissors, and some markers will bleed through but it's cute and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: El Scorcho

customer_reviews.title: I want one too...
customer_reviews.text: Got this colouring book for my daughter who loves all things cats... It's super adorable and the paper quality is great. I may just pick up a copy for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Niamh Dhabolt

customer_reviews.title: Meow
customer_reviews.text: This book is perfect to add to my color book collection. The book cover is glossy and well made. The pages are a nice thick paper so markers and pens wont bleed in. It is a thick book, so its has plenty of pages. It has pages with detailed parts to color and other pages have big designs. As a Pusheen fan I recommend to any cat person out there <3
customer_reviews.author: Glad Dee

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Marker bleeds through... but coloring is still fun either way
customer_reviews.text: Cute coloring book! love the amount of pages & how much there is to color. Wish the pages were just a wee bit thicker
customer_reviews.author: Courteney bee

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is cute. It saved me from boredom on a rainy day. Coloring it was cool
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was honestly very cute. I gave it to an art major friend who seemed stressed from school and loved Pusheen. I know, I'm creative when thinking of gifts. But it came on time and in good condition so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: SkyTan

customer_reviews.title: Cute artwork that's geared toward younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and pretty artwork. It is however, not very detailed and this book would be better suited from younger children. Not and adult coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Danny BoydTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Large size
customer_reviews.text: My 10yo daughter absolutely LOVED this Coring book. The book is worth the price, it is not a thin book at all, and is a large size overall. She’s had it 6mo now and is not finished yet :D
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is very sturdy and much larger than expected. It is very nicely made with a lot of pages to color. My 10 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Love this coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coloring book, it's fantastic! I love Pusheen and these pages are fun and creative!
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, good for a variety of ages
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute that my friend had me order one for her when she saw mine. There's a variety of more detailed pictures and larger print (quicker to color) pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is adorable. My daughter absolutely loves it. She has a Pusheen book that she thinks is hilarious, so she was really happy to have this to color. This would also be great for adults who want to color.
customer_reviews.author: MMLSU

customer_reviews.title: The Cat's Meow
customer_reviews.text: OMG <3 This coloring book is phenomenal :) Very large with lots and lots of different Pusheen cats and her friends!!! Super amazing gift for my dauhter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Sumrell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to any pusheen lover
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable and relaxing. I’ve thought about framing a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Cuuuuute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pictures and great for colored pencils! The only trouble I'm having with this is deciding which page to color first.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Cute but difficult to color
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are cute, but I would have preferred fewer repeat designs printed only on one side. And it is impossible to remove pages because there are no preferations. You have to take the entire book apart in order to color any of the pages!
customer_reviews.author: lynn a morris

customer_reviews.text: really really cute coloring book! good for de-stressing, and is really big and full of cute pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Carter

customer_reviews.title: awesome coloring book
customer_reviews.text: my 9year old loves her Pusheen coloring book. i also ended up getting her the mini pusheen coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: This is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute!! I bought this for my sister in law that really likes Pusheen. When I received it and went through the pages, I loved how it's so cute. I kind of wanted one for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther S.
